snippet: In the first episode of True South, a new video series, T’s contributing editor Sara Ruffin Costello visits two buzzy just-opened restaurants, Killer Poboys and Marti’s, that capture the essence of the modern-day New Orleans culinary scene.
abstract: In the first episode of True South, a new video series, T’s contributing editor Sara Ruffin Costello visits two buzzy just-opened restaurants, Killer Poboys and Marti’s, that capture the essence of the modern-day New Orleans culinary scene.

headline.main: True South | New Orleans Dining, High and Low
